mapper.insert: insert into resume (rsphoto, rstitle, rscareer, rscompany, rsworkstart, rsworkend, rswork, rsacademic, rsacademicstat, rsintroduce, rslisence, rslisenceorg, rslisenceyear, rslanguage, rslanguagelevel, rsregdate) values (#{rsphoto}, #{rstitle}, #{rscareer}, #{rscompany}, #{rsworkstart}, #{rsworkend}, #{rswork}, #{rsacademic}, #{rsacademicstat}, #{rsintroduce}, #{rslicense}, #{rslicenseorg},#{rslicenseyear},#{rslanguage}, #{rslanguagelevel}, sysdate())
